Bootstrap components

Built in components for the most popular front-end framework with
examples and code snippets for every new component.

Alerts

Flash messages, or alerts, inform users of successful or pending actions. Use them sparingly. Don't show more than one at a time.

A simple primary alert—check it out!
A simple secondary alert—check it out!
A simple success alert—check it out!
A simple danger alert—check it out!
A simple warning alert—check it out!
A simple info alert—check it out!
A simple dark alert—check it out!
A simple purple alert—check it out!
A simple light alert—check it out!

Badges

Documentation and examples for badges, our small count and labeling component. Badges scale to match the size of the immediate parent element by using relative font sizing and em units.

Examples
Primary Secondary Success Danger Warning Info Light Dark Purple
Pill badges

Breadcrumb

Breadcrumbs are used to show taxonomical context on pages that are many levels deep in a site’s hierarchy. Breadcrumbs show and link to parent, grandparent, and sometimes great-grandparent pages.

  1. Home
  2. Games
  3. The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
  1. Home
  1. Home
  2. Games
  1. Home
  2. Games
  3. The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
Buttons

Buttons are used for actions, like in forms, while textual hyperlinks are used for destinations, or moving from one page to another.

Columns

Use our powerful mobile-first flexbox grid to build layouts of all shapes and sizes thanks to a twelve column system, five default responsive tiers, Sass variables and mixins, and dozens of predefined classes.

Dropdowns

Dropdowns are lightweight, JavaScript-powered context menus for housing navigation and actions. They’re great for instances where you don’t need the full power and code of the select menu.

Example

About Gameforest

Gameforest is a Bootstrap Gaming theme what is built on the world's most popular front-end framework. Clean and well coded professional front-end files are included in your downloaded package.

Purchase theme
Popular Categories
Playstation 4 Xbox One God of War Bioshock Uncharted 4 Uplay Steam Wordpress Rachet Github
